creator: adelbert.groebbens@intec.rug.ac.be
text:
javax.media.jai package is needed for rendering to pdf 

this was not standard available in my j2se1.4.1 edition ?!

so documentation mentioned everything was in the
FOP distribution,

but I also needed to  downloadthe Java(TM) Advanced Imaging API 1.1.2 Beta 
to solve this

Yes, you have to download and install Jimi or JAI if want to process png etc
images with FOP.
creator: oleg@tkachenko.com
